#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,j,max,min,a[100];
    max = 0;
    min = 100;
    scanf("%d%d",&t,&n);
    while(t--)
    {
        j = 0;
        while(j<n)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[j]);
            if(a[j]>max)
                max = a[j];
            if(a[j]<min)
                min = a[j];
            j++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",max-min);
        max = 0;
        min = 100;
    }
    return 0;
}
